Description: Glazed composition shabti of Djehutyirdis with a striated lappet-wig, a carved face with a beard, parallel hands in relief holding relief representations of a hoe, an adze and the cord of a seed-bag which hands over the shoulder, the front is inscribed with incised Hieroglyphs in two bands running across the waist and down the front of the legs, there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
